name: CaliforniaSerogroupVirusDiseasesDisordersICD10CM
title: California Serogroup Virus Diseases (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
description: California serogroup virus disease includes California encephalitis virus disease, Jamestown Canyon virus disease, La Crosse virus disease, Keystone virus disease, Snowshoe hare virus disease, and Trivittatus virus disease.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has California Serogroup Virus Disease regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: California serogroup, California encephalitis, Jamestown Canyon, La Crosse, Keystone, Snowshoe hare, and Trivittatus),(Exclusion Criteria: Other arboviral conditions)
